front.title: DTLS-SRTP Handling in Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Back-to-Back User Agents (B2BUAs)

abstract.t: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Back-to-Back User Agents (B2BUAs) often function on the media plane, rather than just on the signaling path. This document describes the behavior B2BUAs should follow when acting on the media plane that use Secure Real-time Transport (SRTP) security context setup with Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocol.
